description: Maps original broken tasks to disguised pipeline test tasks

tasks.violationType: Uses relative path with File.Exists without TaskEnvironment resolution
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename path-related variables to generic names like 'targetFilePath', 'outputFile'. Remove any comments referencing relative paths.

tasks.violationType: Uses relative path with Directory.Exists without TaskEnvironment resolution
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename directory variables to 'outputDir', 'targetDirectory'. Rename method params to match build output validation semantics.

tasks.violationType: Opens FileStream with relative path without TaskEnvironment resolution
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename stream variables to 'contentStream', 'resourceStream'. Rename file path params to 'resourceFile', 'embeddedResource'.

tasks.violationType: Loads XDocument with relative path without TaskEnvironment resolution
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename XML-related variables to 'projectConfig', 'configDocument'. Rename path params to 'configFilePath', 'projectFile'.

tasks.violationType: Has RunsInSTAThread attribute but still uses Path.GetFullPath directly
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename path variables to 'normalizedPath', 'resolvedInput'. Remove underscores from identifiers.

tasks.violationType: Has TaskEnvironment available but ignores it, using Path.GetFullPath instead
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename variables to 'sourceFile', 'resolvedSource'. Remove references to 'TaskEnv' in any comments or variable names.

tasks.violationType: Uses Path.GetFullPath for canonicalization instead of TaskEnvironment.GetFullPath
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'canonicalPath', 'cleanPath'. Simplify method names to remove 'Canonicalization' prefix references.

tasks.violationType: Reads environment variables directly via Environment.GetEnvironmentVariable
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename env var references to 'configValue', 'settingValue'. Rename methods to 'ReadConfiguration', 'GetSetting'.

tasks.violationType: Sets environment variables directly via Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'configKey', 'configValue'. Rename methods to 'ApplyConfiguration', 'SetBuildOption'.

tasks.violationType: Reads Environment.CurrentDirectory directly instead of using TaskEnvironment
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename 'currentDir' to 'workingDir', 'baseDirectory'. Remove 'Environment' from local variable names.

tasks.violationType: Sets Environment.CurrentDirectory directly, affecting all threads
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'targetContext', 'contextDirectory'. Rename methods to 'SwitchContext', 'SetActiveDirectory'.

tasks.violationType: Creates ProcessStartInfo without using TaskEnvironment for working directory
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename process variables to 'toolProcess', 'executionContext'. Rename to 'RunTool', 'InvokeTool'.

tasks.violationType: Calls Environment.Exit which terminates the entire process
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename exit-related variables to 'abortReason', 'terminationCode'. Rename methods to 'HandleAbort', 'ProcessFailure'.

tasks.violationType: Calls Environment.FailFast which crashes the process immediately
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'errorMessage', 'criticalFailure'. Rename methods to 'HandleCriticalError', 'ReportFatalCondition'.

tasks.violationType: Calls Process.Kill without proper process lifecycle management
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'targetProcess', 'processHandle'. Rename methods to 'TerminateProcess', 'CleanupStaleProcess'.

tasks.violationType: Writes directly to Console.WriteLine instead of using MSBuild logging
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'logMessage', 'diagnosticOutput'. Rename methods to 'LogDiagnostic', 'WriteDiagnosticInfo'.

tasks.violationType: Reads from Console.ReadLine which blocks and is not thread-safe in MSBuild
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'userResponse', 'promptResult'. Rename methods to 'PromptUser', 'GetUserConfirmation'.

tasks.violationType: Redirects Console.SetOut which affects all threads globally
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'outputWriter', 'redirectTarget'. Rename methods to 'RedirectOutput', 'ConfigureOutputStream'.

tasks.violationType: Has thread-safety attribute but uses forbidden APIs internally
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'legacyPath', 'resolvedLegacyPath'. Remove references to 'Forbidden' or 'Attribute' in variables.

tasks.violationType: Null-checks TaskEnvironment and falls back to unsafe path resolution
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'resolvedPath', 'fallbackPath'. Rename null-check variable to 'pathResolver', 'resolverInstance'.

tasks.violationType: Has TaskEnvironment property but ignores it entirely, using direct path APIs
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'directPath', 'inputPath'. Remove any variable names containing 'Ignore' or 'TaskEnv'.

tasks.violationType: Calls Path.GetFullPath indirectly through a helper method
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename helper method to 'ResolveDependencyPath'. Rename variables to 'dependencyPath', 'resolvedDependency'.

tasks.violationType: Lambda expression captures Environment.CurrentDirectory at definition time
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename lambda to 'processItem', 'itemHandler'. Rename captured vars to 'batchRoot', 'processingBase'.

tasks.violationType: Uses shared mutable static field that causes race conditions across task instances
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename static field to 's_buildState' or '_trackerCache'. Rename methods to 'TrackBuildItem', 'GetBuildStatus'.

tasks.violationType: Partially migrated - some paths use TaskEnvironment, others still use direct APIs
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'primaryPath', 'secondaryPath'. Rename methods to 'ResolvePrimaryPath', 'ResolveSecondaryPath'.

tasks.violationType: Resolves path twice - once via TaskEnvironment and once via Path.GetFullPath
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'canonicalPath', 'normalizedOutput'. Rename methods to 'BuildCanonicalPath', 'NormalizePath'.

tasks.violationType: Unsafe path resolution buried deep in a multi-level call chain
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename chain methods to 'ProcessInputFile', 'ValidateInput', 'ResolveInputPath'. Rename vars to 'inputFile', 'processedFile'.

tasks.violationType: Base class contains unsafe path resolution hidden from the derived task
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename base class to 'BaseFileProcessor'. Rename methods to 'ProcessSourceFile', 'GetSourcePath'.

tasks.violationType: Utility/helper class used by the task contains unsafe path operations
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename utility class to 'PathConfigHelper'. Rename methods to 'ConfigureOutputPath', 'SetOutputDirectory'.

tasks.violationType: Async delegate captures and uses unsafe path resolution on background thread
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename delegate to 'hashComputation', 'fileHashAction'. Rename vars to 'fileHash', 'computedHash'.

tasks.violationType: Event handler performs unsafe path resolution when triggered
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename event handler to 'OnFileChanged', 'HandleFileModification'. Rename vars to 'changedFile', 'monitoredPath'.

tasks.violationType: ThreadPool work item uses unsafe path resolution on pool thread
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'workItem', 'dispatchedTask'. Rename methods to 'DispatchWork', 'ProcessWorkItem'.

tasks.violationType: Lazy<T> initialization captures unsafe path resolution at first access
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename Lazy field to '_deferredConfig', '_lazySettings'. Rename methods to 'LoadConfiguration', 'GetDeferredValue'.

tasks.violationType: LINQ pipeline contains unsafe path resolution in Select/Where predicates
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename LINQ vars to 'filteredItems', 'matchingEntries'. Rename methods to 'FilterItems', 'ApplyItemFilter'.

tasks.violationType: Dictionary cache stores results of unsafe path resolution, shared across instances
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename cache to '_assemblyCache', '_resolvedAssemblies'. Rename methods to 'ResolveAssembly', 'GetCachedAssembly'.

tasks.violationType: Analyzes project files using unsafe path resolution for project references
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'projectReference', 'analyzedReference'. Rename methods to 'AnalyzeReferences', 'ResolveProjectReference'.

tasks.violationType: Validates NuGet packages using unsafe path resolution for package locations
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'packagePath', 'integrityResult'. Rename methods to 'CheckIntegrity', 'ValidatePackageContents'.

tasks.violationType: Resolves assembly references using unsafe path APIs for framework assembly locations
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'frameworkAssembly', 'locatedAssembly'. Rename methods to 'LocateAssembly', 'FindFrameworkAssembly'.

tasks.violationType: Race condition between reading CWD and using it for path resolution
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'contextPath', 'resolvedContext'. Remove any references to 'Race', 'Cwd', or 'Condition'.

tasks.violationType: Time-of-check-time-of-use vulnerability with environment variable reads
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'validatedConfig', 'configSnapshot'. Remove references to 'Toctou', 'EnvVar'. Use 'ValidateConfig', 'SnapshotConfiguration'.

tasks.violationType: Static cache causes path collisions when multiple tasks resolve the same relative path
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to '_pathCache', 'cachedResolution'. Remove 'Collision' from all identifiers. Use 'CachePath', 'GetCachedPath'.

tasks.violationType: Shared temp file name causes conflicts when multiple tasks run concurrently
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'intermediateFile', 'transformedOutput'. Remove 'Conflict', 'Shared', 'Temp' from identifiers.

tasks.violationType: ProcessStartInfo inherits current working directory which may have been changed by another thread
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to 'toolchainProcess', 'invokerConfig'. Remove 'Cwd', 'Inherits' from identifiers. Use 'InvokeToolchain', 'ConfigureInvocation'.

tasks.violationType: Lazily captures environment variable that may change between capture and use
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to '_sdkLocation', 'providerResult'. Remove 'Lazy', 'Capture', 'EnvVar' from identifiers. Use 'GetSdkLocation', 'ProvideSdkPath'.

tasks.violationType: Registry-style global state dictionary shared across all task instances
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to '_buildState', 'stateManager'. Remove 'Registry', 'Global' from identifiers. Use 'ManageState', 'GetBuildState'.

tasks.violationType: FileSystemWatcher sends global notifications that interfere across concurrent tasks
tasks.renamingGuidance: Rename to '_changeDetector', 'detectedChanges'. Remove 'Global', 'Notifications' from identifiers. Use 'DetectChanges', 'MonitorChanges'.
